channel.title: [508] how to make a object id case have 2 or more ways to work? look to see

item.title: [508] how to make a object id case have 2 or more ways to work? look to see
item.dc:creator: @sponge_bong sponge bong
item.description:
@sponge_bong wrote:

ok i need help. in my slayer tower i have 2 of the same doors with same ids, so i made this in objectoptions.java

[code]case 10529:
if(p.absX == 3427 && p.absY == 3556 && p.heightLevel == 1)
{
p.setCoords(3427, 3555, 1);
}
break;

if(p.absX == 3445 && p.absY == 3554 && p.heightLevel == 2)
{
p.setCoords(3445, 3555, 2);
}
break;[/code]

but i dont know how to make them connect? can someone help me? i know im missing something.

Read full topic
item.source: [508] how to make a object id case have 2 or more ways to work? look to see
